participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Alex loves exploring the outdoors and is always up for a challenge.
participant_1.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i've a black lab named trooper. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.

participant_2.name: Emily Parker
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, Emily finds joy in creating things and caring for others, but she has a deep-seated fear of loss.
participant_2.background: knitting is my passion. i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
